thread.section_title: Stand Together for Education Reform. Online Petitions.
thread.title: Demand the HSE grant medicinal cannabis treatment for Ava Barry
thread.title_full: Demand the HSE grant medicinal cannabis treatment for Ava Barry

title: Demand the HSE grant medicinal cannabis treatment for Ava Barry
text:
by: Teresa McCarthy target: HSE 
The HSE have today turned down an application for a six year old girl suffering from Dravet syndrome and experiences up to 23 seizures a day to receive medicinal cannabis treatment which was recent recommended that cannabis be available for use in the treatment of severe, refractory or treatment resistant epilepsy. It's appalling that the hold over this little girls treatment is being kept out of her mothers hand. I intend to submit this survey to the HSE and any other parties I research to be of benefit. Please share and sign
